footer.legalNotice: Legal content is scaffolded and should be replaced with approved production text before public launch.

earlyAccess.message: {appName} is under active development. Features may change, and some things might not work perfectly yet.

cookieBanner.message: We use essential cookies to keep {appName} stable and optional cookies to improve your experience. See our

translationNotice.message: This page was recently translated with AI support and may still contain translation errors.

networkStatus.offlineDescription: Login and cloud sync are unavailable right now. We'll keep checking and reconnect automatically.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Reach out with product questions, bugs, partnerships, or translation feedback.
contact.responseNote: We usually reply within 2-3 business days.

form.title: Send us a message
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help.
form.privacyNote: We use these details only to process and reply to your request.
form.successBody: Thanks, your message was sent successfully.
form.errorBody: We could not submit your message through the form. Please email us directly instead.
form.fallbackBody: If the form limit is reached or submission fails, contact us at:
form.validationEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
form.validationMessageLength: Your message is too long. Maximum is {max} characters.

tripArchive.title: Archive trip?
tripArchive.messageQuestion: Are you sure you want to archive "{title}"?
tripArchive.messageDetail: This trip will be removed from your list and can be restored later.

roundTripSync.title: Update roundtrip endpoint?
roundTripSync.messageLead: This trip looks like a roundtrip.
roundTripSync.messageQuestion: Also change the final city to "{title}"?

cityPaletteApply.title: Apply palette to current cities?
cityPaletteApply.messageAuto: Choose Apply automatically to recolor all cities now.
cityPaletteApply.messageManual: Choose Manual selection to keep existing city colors and only switch the active palette.

markdownLink.title: Insert link
markdownLink.messageLine1: Enter a URL for the selected text or insert a new link.
markdownLink.messageLine2: The link opens in a new tab with secure defaults.
markdownLink.label: URL
markdownLink.validationProtocol: URL must start with http:// or https://

offline.title: You are offline. Changes will be queued.
offline.messageNone: Planner stays usable with cached data.
offline.messageOne: {count} change is queued and will sync after reconnect.
offline.messageMany: {count} changes are queued and will sync after reconnect.
offline.browserTitle: You are offline. Changes stay local.
offline.browserMessage: Reconnect to continue cloud sync. We will retry automatically.
offline.serviceMessage: Your internet works, but the sync service is not responding. Edits stay queued and safe.

degraded.title: Connection is unstable. Saving in resilient mode.
degraded.messageNone: Planner stays usable while we retry in the background.
degraded.messageOne: {count} queued change will sync when Supabase stabilizes.
degraded.messageMany: {count} queued changes will sync when Supabase stabilizes.
degraded.serviceMessage: Cloud sync is unstable right now. We keep retrying in the background.

banner.forcedMode: Supabase outage simulation is currently forced in debugger mode.
banner.retryHint: Retrying Supabase connection every 30s while this tab stays open.

offline.messageNone: Offline mode enabled. Trip data is served from local cache.
offline.messageOne: Offline mode enabled. {count} change is queued for sync.
offline.messageMany: Offline mode enabled. {count} changes are queued for sync.
offline.browser: Offline mode enabled. Your latest edits are saved locally until reconnect.
offline.service: Cloud sync is currently unavailable. Your latest edits are queued safely.

degraded.messageNone: Connection is degraded. Edits are protected with local queue fallback.
degraded.messageOne: Connection is degraded. {count} change is queued for replay.
degraded.messageMany: Connection is degraded. {count} changes are queued for replay.
degraded.service: Connection is degraded. We are retrying queued edits in the background.

tripStrip.serverBackup: A newer server version was backed up before replay. You can restore it if needed.
tripStrip.pendingOne: {count} queued change is waiting for replay.
tripStrip.pendingMany: {count} queued changes are waiting for replay.

toast.title: Sync status
toast.serverBackupRestored: Server backup restored for this trip.
toast.syncPartialFailureOne: {count} queued change still failed. You can retry.
toast.syncPartialFailureMany: {count} queued changes still failed. You can retry.

details.offlineBrowser: You are offline. Edits are stored locally and replayed once you reconnect.
details.offlineService: Your internet is up, but cloud sync appears unavailable. We will keep retrying queued edits.
details.syncingQueue: Syncing queued edits now. Pending items: {count}.
details.online: Connection is healthy and sync is up to date.

strip.directSinceDate: Trip preview paused since {date}. Reactivate now to unlock full planning mode.
strip.directNoDate: Trip preview paused. Reactivate now to unlock full planning mode.
strip.loginSinceDate: Trip preview paused since {date}. Sign in to reactivate and unlock full planning mode.
strip.loginNoDate: Trip preview paused. Sign in to reactivate and unlock full planning mode.

title.direct: Reactivate this trip to keep planning
title.login: Sign in to reactivate this trip

description.direct: You are signed in. Reactivate now to restore editing, destination names, and map routing.
description.login: Sign in to restore editing, destination names, and map routing.

footer.withDate: Expired on {date}. Preview mode stays visible until you reactivate.
footer.noDate: Preview mode stays visible until you reactivate.

toast.title: Trip reactivated
toast.description: Full planning mode is unlocked again.
